website_summaries.verdict: A durable and sturdy model that will hold bags up to 100 pounds. Dual purpose, with platform space for a speed bag.
pros: Dual purpose stand that can hold a punch bag of up to 100 pounds., while featuring an extra stand for added speed bag
cons: Supplied tools are not up to standard, so you may need to pick up a socket set

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheep quality. After three uses the wood on the speed bag mount broke. Two out of the three uses the heavy bag has come loose and fallen. So much for everlast name, should be WONTLAST. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen phillips

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional stand.
customer_reviews.text: The stand does what it's supposed to do. Pretty sturdy. Some of the holes didn't quite line up but a little hammer repositioning and the bolts slid in effortlessly. Some peoples reviews had them complaining of scratches and dents. Why would the appearance of the stand make any difference if it serves it's function? Unless they just bought it for show. Holds up my 100lb bag and doesn't slide around much. I'll probably weight it down anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Cainan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the box they ship it in (which was also junk)
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage, plain and simple. There are other products on the market worth your time and money. This one is not. It is insanely difficult to put together due to the misalignment of holes and the hardware provided is junk. AFTER ONLY ONE USE THE SPEEDBAG BROKE OFF OF THE MOUNT, meaning the unit is now useless. I WILL be getting a refund and won't ever buy from this company again. Far cry from what everlast used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jason1326

customer_reviews.title: Had a bad day at work
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad day at work, look no further than this...works great...who needs jail time because the senior managers of your organization keep promoting the same kiss ass sycophants. Don't murder someone, go home and pound the ever living hell out of a 70lb back and dream it is the souls of your enemies you are crushing...have fun..you will love it. Feel the destructive power of your fists...set them free. How can you feel the weeping and lamentations of the women of the enemies you'd like to crush if you DONT train.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Dad

customer_reviews.title: Need help from Everlast ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Need some help here Everlast. I started assembling the stand this evening and the base holes are out of alignment. This is piece 01, the center base tube. The holes on the right side are out of alignment with the left which makes it impossible to attach the heavy bag tube. This isn't just sloppy incompetence, it is insulting to all your customers. Need a replacement piece 01 rather than a replacement ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a quality product for the price. I had read a few reviews, some negative, before buying and I have to say I'm completely satisfied with this stand. It was easy to put together, is sturdy as hell, and was almost half the price of some of the others. Since I'm having to use it in my garage it does slide a bit and has to be readjusted, but that's to be expected on a cement floor. Plus it does have poles to store your plates and weight it down even more, which would solve that problem, I just don't want my weights in the garage. On a carpet floor I'm sure you wouldn't even notice.
customer_reviews.author: Patric Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Solid and nice - But Sold damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived very well packaged. Nothing was rattling around. However, it came with scratches and deep gouges so it must have been boxed up in that condition. Imagine my embarrassment when the gift recipient was curious I’d bought it used. Very disappointing. If I wanted an open box, I would have bought one. All that said, the item itself is sturdy and wasn’t terribly difficult to assemble, even for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl42

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not terrible
customer_reviews.text: The speed bag swivel is pure trash, you will definitely want to replace that with something more sturdy. The box was banged up, and one of the main pipes was bent meaning I couldn't fit the upper pillar into the receiver without first getting a hammer and an auto-body dolly and bumping put the part that got dented in. It does seem to be relatively sturdy though, and I am hopeful it will serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: julio

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Came well packaged with instruction and hardware. Nearing the end of putting it together, I realized that the "eyebolt" hardware provided (for hanging the heavy bag onto) was actually a hook. I contacted Everlast immediately to let them know that a hook wouldn't be ideal for keeping the heavy bag up unless I was just going to look at it. They replied swiftly and apologized and will be sending me the appropriate eyebolt directly. Great customer service from them.
customer_reviews.author: dave mueller

customer_reviews.title: As expected but a tight fit with tall bag
customer_reviews.text: Needs about 8in more height. Showed up without damage so that's good. I used my impact driver with socket attachment to assemble it. Don't waste your time with the tool included. Make sure you brace the allen wrench when torquing the nuts. I'll likely bolt it into the ground instead of adding weights. I rotated the speed bag assembly for space. Won't tie down the bottom of the bag, I prefer a little movement.
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Was bought as a Christmas present and looked like it had been used
customer_reviews.text: Item was scratched everywhere. Was bought as a Christmas present and looked like it had been used. Was very disappointed. But didn't want to deal with returning and getting another since it was part of Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: kara wieas

customer_reviews.title: Great station
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice stand and easy to put together. Two recommendations: 1.- you are going to have to put some weight on each “leg” of the stand, at least you are going to have to put around 35 to 40lb to make it sturdy enough. 2.- the stand comes with a plastic speed bag swivel, I definitely recommend to buy a profesional one, a metallic before any use. I followed this recommendation from another review and it was the best investment for the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Yitani Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hands down it comes with everything you need to put it together I was reading other comments but I can only speak for myself great buy strong build nothing was damaged see pictures bag not included
customer_reviews.author: ELECTRONIC PROS

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together however I reccomend using your own tools opposed to the ones provided. It will take some tweaking to get the holes all lined up properly BUT THEY WILL LINE UP! Dont fully tighten everything until you have it lined up, you may need to back step and loosen something to line up the next step but it's simple to figure out. Took about 45 minutes to put together. Put my 100lbs heavy bag on it and the stand hardly moves unless I did a front kick. I will be adding some sandbags for extra stability. So far so good though
customer_reviews.author: Mo Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Works great once assembled
customer_reviews.text: When installing do your self a favor and get a 16mm wrench or better yet a socket. A 12mm will help too for the 2 small bolts that hold up the punching bag wood. Only reason it lost a star is that I had to pry alot to get one of the side uprights bolts in. Even with all bolts dead loose the angle just wasn't right. Ultimately I got it in backwards and it works. Nice and quiet during use, much better than hanging from the basement ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gemelli

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage....I was so excited to get this in...I ordered it for my gym to allow another cardio option for my members and within a week of having it assembled the speed bag was basically not operational. The "wood" base literally tore away from the structure and became so unsteady we had to basically scrap it and use it as a heavy bag stand and re order a different speed bag set up. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Booth

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the negative comments- here’s the secret to setting this up. Put it together but don’t tighten the nuts until all done. In this was you can more easily line up the bolt holes. You will definitely want to put weights on the base to stabilize. Also ditch the swivel for a better one without the plastic ball joint.
customer_reviews.author: Czfan#1

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It is pretty sturdy and seems to be a great value for the price. Also, attractive to the eye.
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of hours to assemble, but it is very sturdy once it is all put together. You need to support it with some weights so that it does not move around while you hit it. It is a very attractive stand and it looks nice with the matching bag. I have not used the speed bag attachment yet, but it does not take up quite as much space as I had estimated. It is pretty easy to assemble, but you really need to people to hold the pieces in place at first.
customer_reviews.author: cobracommander15

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy bag bmount
customer_reviews.text: I started doing kickboxing last year so I wanted to get a little home gym too. I bought this to mount a heavy bag. My only complaint is that it moves if you hit it with a nice amount of power. I have 40lb weights on every point of contact and it still moves around a little bit when I really get into the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Will Batson

customer_reviews.title: You WILL 100% have to weigh the frame down. ...
customer_reviews.text: You WILL 100% have to weigh the frame down. I have 4 x 10lb sand bags and its still not enough. I have 1 other bag that can hold 40lbs, so I will be filling that up and using it and then I expect the frame to not move when punching and kicking the bag that hangs from it. I know other reviews said that their frames were dinged or holes not lining up and I DID NOT have any issues of that nature. A friend put it together for me in about 15 minutes and there were not issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hotel quality
customer_reviews.text: Hotel quality stand. Bought for garage style workouts with reluctance after reading reviews that called quality into question. Can confirm... quality and sturdiness are 1 star. 50# bag on one side, weighted down at the points accordingly and was still unstable for use by teenagers working technique. Speed bag side, unless you plan to reinforce prior to assembly, this will not last long unless it’s only intent is to collect dust. In short, by quality or diy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mattocks

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money & Time
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for our son , as u can see in the pictures one side on the base center piece does not have the holes , so it’s useless, really disappointed first because our want it so badly and second because it’s heavy to send it back and also a pain to package... don’t by this and nothing else from this seller...
customer_reviews.author: Alexeis

customer_reviews.title: 1. Bolts were missing. Amazon gave me 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: 1. Bolts were missing. Amazon gave me 20 percent back and I was able to get Everlast to provide the missing bolts 2. The weld on one of the support arms cracked when tightening bolts. The metal moves a little during tightening and the weld is too close to the bend... poorly engineered. 3. The bolts that go into the foam pads aren't correct. They are a size too big. 4. The whole packaging in general isn't made to protect the pieces during shipping. Multiple parts were scuffed, scratched, some seemed slightly bent near bolt holes. Buyer beware. The only reason I gave this 2 stars instead of 1 is that Everlast has a decent parts replacement program.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Unstable, doesn't fit together quite right.
customer_reviews.text: This was way bigger than I expected, but that's my mistake, not theirs. It's also not why I returned this. Unfortunately, building this thing is not a good experience, and it is not stable enough for heavy use. The pieces don't fit together properly, many of the bolts were the wrong length, and because of this it wobbles dangerously with use. This, combined with no bottom tie for the bag, makes this stand a hard: pass.
customer_reviews.author: renegadespork

customer_reviews.title: The box was pretty beat up when I received it and there are ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was pretty beat up when I received it and there are pieces missing. I only have the bars but no bolts or pegs. Can someone contact me ASAP and overnight these missing pieces to me? I would like to assemble the product and be able to write a positive review about its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: support bolt holes not alligned!
customer_reviews.text: upon assembly i noticed that the lower support bolts on the verticle shaft were not aligned. it is still usable, but ill need to drill it out for the bolt to fit. otherwise i love it! just what an old man needs.
customer_reviews.author: mike raney

customer_reviews.title: Holes don't line up
customer_reviews.text: Normally I read the reviews and take a shot because people are usually over dramatic about little things. I am very handy at putting together items and custom fabrication, but this unit the holes don't line up at all. They are the same as what everyone else has stated off by a 1/2" and impossible to put the bolts through without drilling out the holes. You would of figured that this company would have a QC department that would be on top of this issue but apparently that isn't the case. Now returning the item is a hassle it is big and bulky and not easy to move around. Don't waste your time and money. Everlast product is horrible!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatartist28

customer_reviews.title: I will gladly spend more money to get a better product. Yeah
customer_reviews.text: I honestly came so close to throwing this thing in the trash. After I spent the time to re-drill the holes which should have already been drilled properly, I was committed to keep it. I should have listened to the other product reviews which stated the holes are out of alignment and the product is made of cheap materials. Never again Everlast. I will gladly spend more money to get a better product. Yeah, this thing is garbage. I didn't want to send it back in the event it was resold. I just couldn't live with myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I should purchase it because of the other reviews that were bad. It is very well made very sturdy and works very well. However was missing a few washers. I just left them off. I put 75 pounds of weight on each peg so that 75 x 3. Doesn't move! Was a bit of a chore to put together because 2 people are supposed to do it. I did it in 3 hours myself.
customer_reviews.author: Keep it 100

customer_reviews.title: Look for Something Else
customer_reviews.text: After mounting I came to realize that the main beam that extends out wasn't properly aligned by the manufacturer and so now the bag hangs slightly to the left. Not the end of the world but come on seriously... The main disappointments are that even though I use an Everlast bag with it, it hangs too low no matter how I try and adjust the hook and/or bag suspenders. Lastly, it rocks around which they probably intended for since they leave a note in the instructions wanting you to buy their "added weight support". The cost cutting on this one is almost too obvious. Will be buying another better quality brand from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S Bulger

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to put together
customer_reviews.text: So everything was going good until I got to the bottom base you could tell that it was bad or just not made correctly the screws were not line up the matter what I did. I really like the part on there Manuel that said if there’s defective parts to contact them and they’ll send them out for a nominal fee. So you said bad products and I have to pay you to get good ones? Ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, we will see how durable it is. I've got a 100lb heavy bag on the stand. I'm 5'2" so the height of the bag is good for me. My partner is 6'2" and it's a little short for him. Where it stands, he'd be punching the very top of the bag. We're going to haveto modify the caribiners and chains to bring it up a few inches.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good product but be aware you need to buy extra weights to hold it in place
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and easy to built. I have a heavy bag of 100 pounds with it and it works just fine. Good to know that I had to put 100 pounds of weights so I stays in place when punching it.
customer_reviews.author: Grégory Bertel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: My husband and 11year old assembled the station. One piece was delivered damaged but the customer service rep was fantastic (way to go Stacy) and we had a replacement piece with the week. We haven’t going to use it a lot yet because I need to get weights for stability. Overall I am really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Asdf

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as seen in the photo couldn’t be more happier with it, currently have a 50 lb bag up on it and I can’t complain if you anchor it down with some weights you’ll have no complaints I do recommend using a socket wrench when you set it up though couldn’t imagine using the tool provided it would’ve taken forever haha but no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Armando S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product if you don't really have any good alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product if you don't really have any good alternative like a gym or whatnot that has a punching bag. Keep in mind though, the maximum weight this product can bear is 100 lbs, so it's mainly used more for speed exercises and not power. Even with weights on the bottom of the stand, I still recommend not fully blasting the bags that'll you be hanging up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed fibe, sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: All parts included worked except square plastic everlast piece was broken. Directions not the best. Recommend using ratchet and socket for install. I am overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Takes up more space than expected but we are pleased with this bag holder
customer_reviews.text: Takes up more space than expected but we are pleased with this bag holder. My husband has almost knocked it over when he gives the bag solid kicks but he is a very big man. The other small issue is that the stabilizers on the bottom can get in the way of fancy footwork. I do not consider this a huge negative, just adds to the challenge of spatial awareness.
customer_reviews.author: Mommacat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is patience is required to put this together. Not every hole lines up with a bolt and some horsepower is needed to finish. After finishing this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Mike

customer_reviews.title: My biggest complaint is with the speed bad platform and swivel
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK stand. My biggest complaint is with the speed bad platform and swivel. Fist of all, the swivel is plastic and rotates too much for speed bag application. Second complaint is the platform. It is made of cheap pressed particle wood. Not even a week after I set it up the areas around the bolt hole completely broke through. I suggest if you do buy this, plan on making your own platform from 3/4 inch plywood and buying an actual speed bag hanger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T-LAST
customer_reviews.text: I've probably only used this 20 times over 2 years and it broke today. No way to secure the nut back onto the stand, because it appears to be machined or glued onto the stand. Why is it not secured using a nut inside of the stand? Gonna try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Char Len

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand. IT went together nice and easy with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stand. IT went together nice and easy with very little fuss even with a 3 year old "helping" me put it together. No parts were missing and the picture instructions (no written instructions) were fine. The reason I knocked 1 star off is because it arrived with scratches and nicks in the finish. The items were packed fairly tight and the end covers weren't the thickest so some of the end pieces tore the foam ends and did damage the finish on some of the pieces. Purely cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I suggest getting another person to assist you with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I suggest getting another person to assist you with the speed bag arm going onto the wood round. I chipped some of the wood while trying to wrestle the bolts into place without slipping. It's strictly cosmedic so it doesn't effect the stand fuction, but save yourself some frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Anding Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is good for the price but is a little wobbly with a 100lb heavy bag on it. The locking nut that holds the hook for the heavy bag came undone after only a few uses. It is easy to fix, I got a nut and lock washer from a hardware store for under $1.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality-cannot be assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Are there any companies out there that still do some kind of quality control? The welds on this piece of junk were so thick that the screws cannot be inserted into the holes. The welding material actually covers half of the hole! I need to stop shopping online and go back to the actual store where I can do my own quality checks!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.text: Quite flimsy and even with a 100 lb heavy bag and 360 lbs of sand bags on the base, it still wants to jump around all over the place when I use it. It's also on foam flooring tiles, so one would think it would stay in place, but nope. Also can't adjust height. Wish it was 6 inches taller.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more disappointed in this product. when the box arrived it looked like it went through a shredder. Having assembled multiple stands I had no issue knowing what went where but assembly was a nightmare. A majority of the metal was warped and required hammering to properly fit together, the speedbag base was chipped in multiple places, scratches all over the metal. I understand this equipment will get wear and tear down the line but the condition i reserved it in looks more used than new
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged before arrival.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived horribly packaged. The package containing the assembly parts was opened and missing several pieces. The stand it self was dented horrbibly in several areas. What’s worse is that once shoddily assembled with what parts that actually arrived with the stand, it could not support the 80lb bag I attached. That’s not to mention the stand moving around all over the place during the very limited amount of time I got to use it before it broke. Incredibly unhappy and downright confused at the abysmal condition of the product I got with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gray

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts & Holes don't line up
customer_reviews.text: The stand, once put together, is great. However, putting it together was difficult. Parts were missing, some bolts and the 3rd padded bar, and some of the holes didn't line up correctly. It took forever, lots of manipulating, to finally get the bolts in those holes. The bolts I could buy from Lowes, but the padded bar I have no clue where to get from.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. Well made and durable. Great alternative instead of hanging punching bags from your ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It was heavier than I thought. This was good because it is sturdier and more durable, but it also meant that I needed a dolly to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly easy to assemble. Instructions are clear. It took me and my son about an hour to assemble and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Franhp

customer_reviews.title: Everlast 2 Bag Stand is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Went together easily and all the parts were there. It does move around when I am punching it so will need weights at the bottom. Not a deficiency of the product. Just the reality of the unit on carpeting with the center of gravity high above the ground. Would be difficult to engineer it and ship it if they made it heavier at the bottom. I waited until the price went way down to under $80 so I got a really good deal but had to wait months for that price. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: It's decent.
customer_reviews.text: They don't make them like they used too. It'll hold together alright, but its creaky and a little loose. The parts aren't perfect, but for the price I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny H.

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This stand was easy to assemble and should work well for years to come. It was what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. You will need to add the ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. You will need to add the counter waits where instructed. I'm using it for a 100 lbs. heavy bag. The speed bag platform is a little small, but works.

customer_reviews.title: Went together in a snap!
customer_reviews.text: Put together in about 40 minutes, solid, nice fit, and I even used the allen wrench that came with it. Now I just have to buy a speed bag. Packaging was protective and organized. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RecciesMom

customer_reviews.title: The stand is extremely sturdy and should last 2 lifetimes
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were easy to follow. Be warned it is very heavy, being well constructed. There is one minor issue in the the speed bag bounce board tends to wobble somewhat from sid to side.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Swartz

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good stand and good price and I do like
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good stand and good price and I do like, but I did have to add weights to keep it from moving around so much ( I recommend something like a cheap bench kit, then you get 90 lbs. of weight for cheap). Assembly was easy, however the stand was damaged when it arrived and I've had to sand down a couple of rough spots and repaint. Also, the nuts and bolts were strewn through out the box. Over all the packaging need monster improvements.
customer_reviews.author: william marx

customer_reviews.title: wooden support of boxing pear station is broken by use
customer_reviews.text: good afternoon first of all tell you that the product seemed very good to me, except for the support of the boxing pear station, the wooden part broke the first month of using it, I would like to know if you can help me or if you sell the wooden part just waiting for your reply, and thanking you for your valuable time
customer_reviews.author: FABIANA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, speed bag swivel could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is nice speed bag stand is alright though could have been better so if you bought it for the speed bag like I did its best to get a wall mounted one for 72 bucks from everlast other than that punching bag I use is 100lbs no swaying in the foundation of the equipment just movement from giving the bag a good beating. Worth the buy if you're looking for something to keep you in shape and up the endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Dubin20

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Speed bag bolt flew across the room with bag. Had it together and after the first use it broke. Thought Everlast was a good brand. This one is not worth your money keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the only thing you will need after built are weights to keep it stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt worth buying
customer_reviews.text: No bolts or nuts at all just frame. Thats what i didnt want. I had a boxing stand already that my mother lost the nuts and bolts that i cant get replaced already. I spent more to just get replacement nuts at hardware store for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Everlast Heavy Bag !
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to put together as some pieces don't totally line up, but otherwise sturdy, efficient, and has been used since assembly with the Everlast Heavy Bag ! Also, doesn't need the back accessory to be attached to use, (waiting to buy the speed bag before setting up and clearing some space in the garage) Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: DJ C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag stand
customer_reviews.text: I only got this stand for the heavy bag. The speed bag attachment sits in another corner of the basement. Overall, the stand is well built and sturdy. It arrived in great condition and was assembled easily. The construction is solid and so far it has held up really well. I ended up using two 50 lb. bags of sand from home depot for stand weights as I already had this in the garage and it hasn't moved at all. I would recommend this product to anyone that is looking for a well built stand and if you can get free shipping, even better!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: ... and removed the rubber end pieces allowed for much better response. Secondly I added more weights than recommended ...
customer_reviews.text: I added sandbags above speed bag stand and removed the rubber end pieces allowed for much better response. Secondly I added more weights than recommended on instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Putting it together was easy, but standing it up was difficult since it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought my fiance a heavy bag for Christmas, but didn't trust any of our ceilings to hold it. This just barely cleared in our basement. Putting it together was easy, but standing it up was difficult since it was just barely below ceiling level. Definitely needs weights to hold it in place. It's pretty huge, also, and with the speed bag attachment it will need to be pretty far from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, might be able to cobble together with your own parts
customer_reviews.text: Bad product, missing parts, also the screws are too long in multiple places including the base and speed bag platform. I can possibly get this to work if I get some hardware on my own. One of the foam plugs is missing. I'll probably return. Shoddy work!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Bundle up on the Everlast Kits and spoil someone
customer_reviews.text: My husband was wanting a heavy bag and a speed bag so I bought the Everlast Speedbag and the Everlast 70 Lb Heavy Bag Kit and he was thereby righteously spoiled. He's very happy with the purchase and so am I. This was shipped fast and well packaged. We have absolutely no complaints about it. (My toes do... but we don't)
customer_reviews.author: Dva

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It was a good price, came as advertised and in good shape, all pieces were packaged in an organized way, it was assembled easily, and fits nicely in my basement. Cons: It's shorter than I'd prefer, perhaps a bit more wobbly than I'd like I have a hundred pound bag and about 140 lbs in weights on it currently, although it's the top of the stand that wobbles. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Everlast? More like "Breaks Fast"
customer_reviews.text: Definitely read the reviews before buying this garbage. $100 for a punching bag stand that took much longer to put together than it should, mainly because all the bolts are near impossible to get tight by hand, although the manual says no tools are needed. Everyone is right. You need sand bags to hold this thing down. In addition, I'm no MMA fighter, but a few solid hooks knocked the punching bag off. Again, the bolt won't tighten enough. Can't say I trust the "Everlast" brand after this.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R.

customer_reviews.title: it is a great item.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with no instructional book and was scratched with small dents. It does take two people to assemble. You do need to add at least 50 pounds of weight (sand bags) on the bottom to keep the stand from moving when in use. For the price, I expected more than what I received. Dents can be pounded out and touch up paint can be applied. Overall, it is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: wvartist

customer_reviews.title: Hit the bag with this
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong , durable and sound have sparring bag on other side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, only issue is when your using the heavy bag the speed bag part rattles around a lot, also had to add weight to it so it wont move around while using the heavy bag but over all I give it 4 stars !!!!
customer_reviews.author: clint wallin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service but Terrible quality control misaligned holes in possible to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bolthole drilled and misaligned impossible to put together . I’ll see if I have any luck with the manufacturer since the return window closed on this Christmas gift ! Edit sent replacement parts promptly and free, works well now
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy heavy duty and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly kinda a butt to put together but I'm just lazy. Lovely item surprised my husband with it all put together!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best Price Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This was close to $100.00 less than the same product being sold at the local sporting goods store. It arrived in perfect shape and overall, it is extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: WHOA~ITS YUGE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is YUGE-you need at LEAST a 9 ft ceiling for it. And its heavy but it still needs to be weighted down because my 16 yr old hits a 70 pound bag and it still moves quite a bit. Pleased with it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Esardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, keeps the bag from rattling our rafters in our basement. Sturdy/Durable. Box arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product shipped
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrendous.. can't believe this was shipped out.. do not order from here.. buyer beware....preexisting damage.. repackaged box. What a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: angelo r

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Could assemble this easily. However it’s not sturdy enough and needs additional weight even for a 70LB bag. The description says it supports 70-100lb which isn’t the case. This isn’t a good base for 70LB punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: darsh

customer_reviews.title: Slight issue with assembly, but otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in sooner than expected, everything was there for it, and the assembly wasn’t too bad. There was a small issue with a couple of the screws not wanting to fit properly, but we were able to fix it with some other tools. I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, and he absolutely loves it, and has already put it to good use. All in all, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap swivel and flimsy platform
customer_reviews.text: Must have a completely level floor which is not the fault of this unit. The speed bag platform is kind of flimsy and needs weights on top to stabilize it. The swivel is cheap and can't keep up with a fast session. I'm replacing it soon. The swivel ball isn't tight and will easily pop up into the holder instead of rolling with the punch. I can work with it, it just gets aggravating at times.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not 84" tall as Amazon has listed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use the stand enough to review the actual product. I just wanted to give prospective purchasers a heads up. The Amazon listing says(in 2 different places) the stand is 84" tall. In the manufacturer listing it says it is 86.2" tall. I had to put mine in a different room than I intended due to that extra 2 inches because I didn't notice the manufacturer listing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffes

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality, Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble - took a couple of hours max. Quality and size of it is impressive. Arrived super fast given the current circumstances of the lockdown. Haven’t got my heavy or speed bag to test it out fully yet, so will update this when I have but I have no doubts it will work great
customer_reviews.author: Jack W

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box I was let down- but easy fixes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for but I've had to use thread lock on all of the screws since they keep loosening. Make sure you have enough weights to stabilize the base. Otherwise the whole thing can tip over. Now that the screws are tight and I've gotten more weights, it works like intended and I can give it a fourth star.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Everlast products have gone down in quality!
customer_reviews.text: I only used the speed bag part and never hooked up the heavy bag. Nonetheless, the top came unglued from the wood and caused the bag to slow down alot and make alot of noise. Of course I could modify it but for what its worth, the equipment sucks. Everlast has gone down in quality. Try another piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It holds a heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. We used an impact drill to chain ours to the garage floor. No sliding around for this thing. Right now we only have a heavy bag on it but plan on attaching a speed bag. I will update with durability.
customer_reviews.author: Derpy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag stand. No damage at all when delivered or issues at all when assembling. Definitely need some weight at the base to steady it, but think that's pretty typical. Happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stand nearly falls over on heavy strikes..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but I’ve nearly knocked it over... I have this is a tight space and was really relying on it not moving when I use it. Looks like I now have to invest in a bunch of weights to have it function as I expected. Buyer beware. Your purchase may not necessarily end here. I’m sure there are better options if you have the same concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the supporting parts are not aligned, the ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the supporting parts are not aligned, the screws could not insert through them. Requested replacement/exchange the parts but the support from Everlast, seems NOT HELPFUL by asking lots of questions. Therefore,it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lok Fai Kwok

customer_reviews.title: It came with many scratches and it was dirty and some rust inside the structure
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality! It came with many scratches and it was dirty and some rust inside the structure.. structure was not straight at all to be easy fixed and it took me too much time and too much work to fix it! Also the speed bag swivel is not good at all and u have to buy and replace it with the professional everlast speed bag swivel for 19$! The stand is very light and must be fixed in the floor or add weight on it to not shake. I didn’t return it because my son want it.. but I’m so disappointed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dianaelmiari

customer_reviews.title: Works the way it was intended
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about putting it together but my 18-year-old did 90% of it by himself without any issues and then he and my husband finished up. It definitely needs to be weighted down.
customer_reviews.author: Carrasquillo Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand but Seems a Bit Short
customer_reviews.text: I got this about a year ago and it's been great. Very sturdy. Holds a 100lb bag with no issues whatsoever. It does slip slightly on hardwood flooring during a session but it's pretty minor. The biggest con is just that it seems to be just a bit short. Placing the bag as high as I could using what was provided still has the label on the bag a bit below eye-level. I'm an average sized fellow so if you want to hang this higher it seems one needs to improvise a bit and choke up a good deal on the chains.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: ... the price I was excepting the quality to be poor but this stand is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was excepting the quality to be poor but this stand is fantastic....I don't know if we are missing a piece though because sometimes the bag wont stay on and will fall off after so many punches. It is easier if two people can put it together because it took my husband three hours just by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Karasch

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience. If I have to return it I’m done with buying items like this from amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Too many nuts and bolt are missing to assemble the stand. I finally opened the box because my 9 year old daughter(karate kid) Begged me to put it ton gether. When I opened the box the stand was obviously used and returned then resold to me. 4 major nuts and bolts were missing from the hardware kit.
customer_reviews.author: rafael Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: A box of garbages
customer_reviews.text: When i unbox this product, it looks like los of garbage stuck in one box and the main part is wrongly installed together like picture. And it is impossible to pull these tow part away. Impossible to istall and Just a box of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Needed to weld it
customer_reviews.text: pictured item is different than the actual part...had to weld it because the nut it comes with is cheap and strips.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a 100 lb punching bag. Very steady construction. Put inside my son’s room . Fit’s well. I also need to buy a chain for a bottom to hold punching bag still. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Inna

product_meta.title: Everlast - 2 Station Heavy Bag Stand
product_meta.description:
Heavy Bag and Speed Bag Stand

Warranty:

Everlast warrants its products to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for a period of 120 days from date of purchase, provided they have not been subjected to obvious abuse, neglect or misuse. Everlast's sole liability is limited to repairing or replacing products that are returned within this 120-day period, unless specific product literature specifies otherwise.

Please contact customer service for full details, and for replacement assistance at 1-800-821-7930.



AMAZON.COM
Boxing training begins and ends with the heavy and speed bags, and this stand from industry leader Everlast holds both. Rugged, powder-coated steel tubing construction and three weight pegs provide maximum durability on the easy-to-assemble stand. It will support any heavy bag up to 100 pounds, and the adjustable height speed bag platform handles all speed bag sizes. The stand measures 48.25-by-84-by-69 inches (W x H x D). 

 About Everlast
The preeminent brand in boxing since 1910, Everlast is a global leader in the design, manufacturing, licensing, and marketing of authentic boxing, mixed martial arts, and fitness-related sporting goods equipment, apparel, footwear, and accessories. From heavyweight champion Jack Dempsey and middleweight legend Sugar Ray Robinson to the undisputed middleweight champion Jermain Taylor and UFC heavyweight champion Randy Couture, Everlast is the brand of choice for generations of world champion professional athletes.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes Everlast – 2 Station Heavy Bad Stand, 4813BDTC model | Plates are not included
Bag Stand dimensions – 47.6" W x 66.5" L x 87" H | Weight limit – 100 lbs. | Clearance space – Side: 4Ft. x 6Ft. Ceiling: 7’ 3” H
Adjustable height | Speed bag platform handles all speed bag sizes
Rugged, powder-coated steel tubing construction and three weight pegs provide maximum durability. All-steel surfaces are powder-coated for scratch resistance and durability

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
